Title: Prohibits the city of New York from increasing property taxes where a property's assessed value has decreased in the previous year
Summary: Prohibits the city of New York from increasing property taxes where a property's assessed value has decreased in the previous year; applies only to class one and class two properties.
LawCode: Add ยง11-239.1, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the city of New York from increasing property taxes where a property's assessed value has decreased in the previous year
